title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Gather data sources and stakeholder input.

title: System Architecture Design for AdPersonaGenerator
description: Design the overall system architecture for the AdPersonaGenerator project. This will include data ingestion, processing, persona generation components, and data security measures. The design should prioritize scalability, performance, maintainability, and ethical implications while ensuring compliance with data privacy regulations (e.g., GDPR, CCPA) and incorporating robust security measures to protect user data. The design phase will follow Project Planning and Requirements Gathering, and be followed by the Data Privacy and Compliance Review. Key considerations include: API design, microservices architecture, database schema design, containerization strategies for scalability and efficiency, on-going monitoring and logging to ensure system performance and identify potential issues. Additionally, emphasize modularity and testability in the design, focusing on separation of concerns between different components. The design should also aim to optimize resource usage to minimize costs. Document the design using clear and concise technical documentation that can be easily understood by developers and other stakeholders. Upon completion, share the design with the assigned team members for further discussion and refinement. In case of any changes in the requirements during this process, update the RFC accordingly. Assign the task to the appropriate team member after finalizing the design. For this specific RFC, I suggest assigning it to 'task-decomposer' and 'code-architect', as they will play crucial roles in breaking down the design into manageable components and implementing it respectively. However, it would be beneficial to involve 'database-specialist' and 'devops-engineer' early in the process for their expertise in database schema design and containerization strategies. If necessary, also include 'security-specialist' to ensure robust security measures are incorporated throughout the design. To streamline the review process, I suggest adding a specific timeline for feedback and revisions before moving to the next phase. Lastly, consider incorporating a section on long-term scalability and future proofing of the system in the design.

title: Data Ingestion and Processing
description: Develop components for ingesting and processing data from various sources (social media, purchase history, online behavior).

title: Persona Generation Algorithm
description: Develop the AI algorithm for generating detailed consumer personas based on the ingested data.

title: User Interface and Reporting
description: Design and develop the user interface for configuring persona generation and viewing generated personas.

title: Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for ingested data and generated personas.

title: Security and Privacy Considerations
description: Implement security measures and ensure compliance with data privacy regulations.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop test plans and perform thorough testing of the system, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment environment, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and monitoring.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, user guides, and training materials for the system.
